text: Ralf Karel Hubert Krewinkel (born 12 November 1974 in Kerkrade) is a Dutch politician. Krewinkel is a member of the Labour Party. He has started his political career as a councillor (1998-2006) and an alderman (2006-2011) of his home town. In 2011 he became mayor of Beek, followed by Heerlen in 2015. He quit in 2019. Both Kerkrade, Beek and Heerlen are in the south of the province of Limburg. == References == * www.rijksoverheid.nl Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Aldermen of the Netherlands Category:Dutch councillors Category:Dutch mayors Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:Politicians from Limburg (Netherlands)
title: Ralf Krewinkel
